level.text: A lease, although subject to this article, is also subject to any applicable:
Certificate of title statute of the District;
Certificate of title statute of another jurisdiction (§ 28:2A-105); or
Consumer protection statute of the District, or final consumer protection decision of a court of the District existing on the effective date of this article.
In case of conflict between this article, other than §§ 28:2A-105, 28:2A-304(c), and 28:2A-305(c), and a statute or decision referred to in subsection (a) of this section, the statute controls.
Failure to comply with an applicable law has only the effect specified therein.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-128
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-128, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:2A-101.
